title: $:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut
name: Go To Shortcut
description: A modal for quickly finding tiddlers that opens with full and easy keyboard navigation.
author: Maurycy Zarzycki
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/Common/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/Common/Settings","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel","caption":"Evidently Cube","text":"\whitespace trim ! Evidently Cube plugins Settings Below are settings for all Evidently Cube plugins. <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EvidentlyCube/SettingsTab]!is[draft]sort[]]" default={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EvidentlyCube/SettingsTab]!is[draft]sort[]limit[1]] }}}/> "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/history","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"* ''0.3.1'' -- Settings moved to common tab * ''0.3.0:'' ** State for the plugin is no longer stored in `$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Store` but in `$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store` as it doesn't need to be stored ** Selected/hovered option colors are fixed to make it actually possible to see what is selected and what is not * ''0.2.1:'' ** Colors are now taken from the current palette so that it works with dark ones too ** Fixed dynamic styles not being executed due to incorrect tiddler type * ''0.2.0:'' ** `Home` and `End` keys now affect the text-input rather than navigating the result list; those shortcuts are now `Ctrl+Home` and `Ctrl+End` ** Added a new option for controlling whether the results are cleared when reopening or not * ''0.1.1'' -- Fixed incorrect filters * ''0.1.0'' -- Rewritten to not use JS * ''0.0.4'' -- First version"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/icon","text":"","type":"image/png"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/license","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"This plugin is licensed under the MIT license. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE."},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"[[Github|https://github.com/EvidentlyCube/TW5-PluginShowcase/tree/main/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TW5-GoToShortcut]] ---- //Inspired by VScode's and IntelliJ's ''Go To...'' functionalities.// ---- ! Features A very powerful quick search/goto mechanism that you access in a fraction of a second fully through the keyboard! * Access the Goto modal with a configurable keyboard shortcut (defaults to `Ctrl+Shift+P`) * Customize the search: ** By default it will skip drafts, tiddlers starting with `$:/` and ones with a field `goto-ignore` ** Prefix the search with `*` to look in titles AND text ** Prefix the search with `!` to look in all non-shadow tiddlers (and combine with the wildcard: `!*`) ** Prefix the search with `>` to look in all regular and shadow tiddlers (and combine with the wildcard: `>*`) ** Input a filter to search directly for it * Configure the template either by overriding the shadow tiddler or providing your own template tiddler * Full keyboard navigation (not customizable): ** `Arrow Up` and `Arrow Down` navigate through the results list ** `Enter` opens the selected tiddler ** `Page Up` and `Page Down` navigate through one page of the results list ** `Ctrl+Home` and `Ctrl+End` go directly to the start/end of the results list ** `Escape` and `Ctr+Shift+P` closes the dialog * You can also select the tiddlers with a mouse. ! Available customizations: * Provide your own filters for the results * Decide if the results are cleared between openings of the modal or not * Use your own template for a result row"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Settings","tags":"$:/tags/EvidentlyCube/SettingsTab","caption":"Go To Shortcut","text":"\define headers-row(name prefix field) ''<<__name__>>''
//<<__prefix__>>// <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field=<<__field__>> size="40"/> \end \define filters-row(name prefix field) ''<<__name__>>''
//<<__prefix__>>// <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field=<<__field__>> size="40" tag="textarea"/> \end Configuration for the [[Go To Shortcut|$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut]] plugin. ! Config The keyboard shortcut can be configured in //Keyboard Shortcuts// tab.
''Open mode''
//What should happen with the results when opening the modal// 		<$select tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field="clear-on-open">
''Displayed results''
//Maximum number of results to display, must be between 1 and 99// 		<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field="rows"/>
''Result row height''
//Height, in pixels, of a results row//
//Use `auto` if you don't want a fixed height//
//If you use a custom template you may want to declare a different static height for everything to fit snuggly// 		<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field="row-height"/>
''Modal size''
//Whether the modal with results should have fixed height//
//or fit the currently displayed number of rows// 		<$select tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field="modal-size">
''Template''
//Original template: [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Template]]//
//`currentTiddler` contains the tiddler//
 <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field="template"/>
''Result row CSS class''
//Change this to avoid the default styling of result rows// 		<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config" field="result-row-class"/>
''Keyboard Shortcut''
//Use this keyboard shortcut to open Go To modal; can be changed in <>tab// 		<$list filter="$:/config/shortcuts/ $:/config/shortcuts-mac/ $:/config/shortcuts-not-mac/ $:/config/shortcuts-linux/ $:/config/shortcuts-not-linux/ $:/config/shortcuts-windows/ $:/config/shortcuts-not-windows/"> <$macrocall $name="displayshortcuts" $output="text/html" shortcuts={{{ [addsuffix[EC-GoToModal]get[text]] }}} prefix="" separator=" " suffix=""/>
! Headers * These are the headers displayed in the modal that change depending on the prefix you use. <> <> <> <> <` prefix" "header-system">> <*` prefix" "header-system-deep">> <>
! Filters * These are the filters that are executed when matching against all the available prefixes. * //The search query is stored in the variable ``.// <> <> <> <> <` prefix" "filter-system">> <*` prefix" "filter-system-deep">>
"},"$:/config/shortcuts/EC-GoToModal":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/EC-GoToModal","text":"ctrl-shift-p"},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/EC-GoToModal":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/EC-GoToModal","text":"Open a modal that allows searching and navigating to a tiddler."},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","rows":"9","row-height":"72","clear-on-open":"1","modal-size":"static","header-system-deep":"Search in any tiddler","result-row-class":"ec-goto_row","template":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Template","filter-system-deep":"[all[tiddlers+shadows]search:text:wordssort[]] [all[tiddlers+shadows]search:title:words!sort[]] [all[tiddlers+shadows]search:title:literal!sort[]] [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix:caseinsensitive!sort[]] +[reverse[]]","header-system":"Go to any tiddler","filter-system":"[all[tiddlers+shadows]search:title:words!sort[]] [all[tiddlers+shadows]search:title:literal!sort[]] [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix:caseinsensitive!sort[]] +[reverse[]]","header-all-deep":"Search in tiddlers (include hidden)","filter-all-deep":"[all[tiddlers]search:text:wordssort[]] [all[tiddlers]search:title:words!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]search:title:literal!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]prefix:caseinsensitive!sort[]] +[reverse[]]","header-all":"Go to tiddler (include hidden)","filter-all":"[all[tiddlers]search:title:words!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]search:title:literal!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]prefix:caseinsensitive!sort[]] +[reverse[]]","header-normal-deep":"Search in tiddlers","filter-normal-deep":"[all[tiddlers]search:text:wordssort[]] [all[tiddlers]search:title:words!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]search:title:literal!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]prefix:caseinsensitive!sort[]] +[!is[draft]!prefix[$:/]field:goto-ignore[]] +[reverse[]]","header-normal":"Go to tiddler","filter-normal":"[all[tiddlers]search:title:words!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]search:title:literal!sort[]] [all[tiddlers]prefix:caseinsensitive!sort[]] +[!is[draft]!prefix[$:/]field:goto-ignore[]] +[reverse[]]","header-filter":"Run filter"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Core":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Core","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/BelowStory","text":"<$list filter="[[$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store]field:active[1]]">
<$button tag="div" class="ec-goto_close"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" active="0"/>
! <$text text={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!header}} />: {{$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Input}}
,,Supported prefixes: [, !, !*, >, >*, *. Hover for more details.,,
{{$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Results}}
"},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Input":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Input","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define action-navigate-up() <$let selected={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!selected}} count={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!results-count}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" selected={{{ [subtract[2]addremainderadd[1]] }}}/> \end \define action-navigate-down() <$let selected={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!selected}} count={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!results-count}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" selected={{{ [remainderadd[1]] }}}/> \end \define action-navigate-pageup() <$let selected={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!selected}} count={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!results-count}} limit={{$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config!!rows}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" selected={{{ [compare:number:eq[1]then] ~[subtractmax[1]] }}}/> \end \define action-navigate-pagedown() <$let selected={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!selected}} count={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!results-count}} limit={{$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config!!rows}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" selected={{{ [compare:number:eqthen[1]] ~[addmin] }}}/> \end \define action-navigate-home() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" selected=1/> \end \define action-navigate-end() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" selected={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!results-count}}/> \end \define action-navigate-close() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" active="0"/> \end \define action-navigate-select() <$let results={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!results}} selected={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!selected}}> <$list filter="[enlistnth]"> <$action-navigate to=<> $scroll="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" active="0"/> \end \define action-search-changed(reset:no) <$let reset=<<__reset__>> lookupSource={{$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store!!lookup}} lookup={{{ [compare:string:eq[yes]then[]] [] +[nth[1]] }}} filter-start="[" mode={{{ [prefixthen[filter]] [prefix[>*]then[system-deep]] [prefix[>]then[system]] [prefix[!*]then[all-deep]] [prefix[!]then[all]] [prefix[*]then[normal-deep]] [[normal]] }}} query={{{ [removeprefix[>*]] [removeprefix[>]] [removeprefix[!*]] [removeprefix[!]] [removeprefix[*]] [] }}} > <$macrocall $name="action-save-results" mode=<> query=<>/> \end \define action-save-results(mode query) <$let mode=<<__mode__>> header={{{ [addprefix[header-]] }}} filter-name={{{ [addprefix[filter-]] }}} query=<<__query__>> filter={{{ [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config]get] }}}> <$list filter="[compare:string:ne[filter]]" emptyMessage=""" <$set name="results" filter=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" header={{{ [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config]get
] }}} results=<> results-count={{{ [enlistcount[]] }}} selected=1 /> """> <$set name="results" filter=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" header={{{ [[$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/Config]get
] }}} results=<> results-count={{{ [enlistcount[]] }}} selected=1 /> \end <$keyboard key="Down" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="Up" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="Page_down" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="Page_up" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="Ctrl+Home" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="Ctrl+End" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="Enter" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="Escape" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/EC-GoToShortcut/Store" field="lookup" placeholder="Input tiddler name here" focus="yes" inputActions=<>/> "},"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/ResultRow":{"title":"$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/GoToShortcut/ResultRow","text":"<$button tag="div" class={{{ [addprefix[row ]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler=<
